casebody.data:
Maria Persichilli, as Administratrix of the Estate of Archangelo Persichilli, Deceased, Plaintiff, v. Triborough Bridge and Tunnel Authority et al., Defendants. Lockwood, Kessler, Bartlett, Inc., Third-Party Plaintiff, v. Nassau-Mascali Construction Corp., Third-Party Defendant. City of New York, Third-Party Plaintiff, v. Nassau-Mascali Construction Corp., Third-Party Defendant. Triborough Bridge and Tunnel Authority, Third-Party Plaintiff-Respondent, v. Nassau-Mascali Construction Corp., Third-Party Defendant-Appellant. Submitted September 28, 1964; decided October 1, 1964. James M. Gilleran and John J. O’Connor for motion.

No one opposed.

Motion denied upon the ground that an appeal lies as of right.
